title: 08/12/21 DPS Hour 2 Kevin Millar and Jim Irsay
itunes:title: 08/12/21 DPS Hour 2 Kevin Millar and Jim Irsay
description:
Kevin Millar talks to Dan about the Field of Dreams. Kevin was talking to Dan while standing on the movie set field, but tells Dan that the actual field is picture perfect.

Jim Irsay tells Dan about his early memories of joining the Indianapolis Colts.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
